                                    H parent2,
                                    int position)
        Description copied from class: EvoChromManipulatorBO

        Specified by:

        parent1 - The first parent
        parent2 - The second parent
        position - The position in the chromosome code where crossover is executed

        The new offsprings created by crossing the code of its parents
